infobox.Japanese title:: 疑惑の天体観測  (Giwaku no Tentaikansoku)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Yasuhiro Moriki (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa, Next Conan's Hint  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri, Next Conan's Hint  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Hirohito Torihata as Koichi Nonaka  Tohru Furuya as Hiroshi Akimoto  Nozomu Sasaki as Kazuhiko Eda  Masahiko Tanaka as Detective Yamada  Isshin Chiba as Policeman  Junichi Sugawara as Forensics officer  Wataru Takagi as Next Conan's Hint

sections.Situation: Ran, Sonoko, and Conan go to watch the stars. Sonoko hopes to see a shooting star. Ran has a friend at the observatory that helps her use a telescope. He introduces his senpais that work at the observatory. One of them just won an award known as the "Star Pioneer", while the other one seems angered. However, that same night, that same person falls from the higher level of the observatory. Conan knows it isn't an accident, but how can he prove it?
